source_reference.text: How to Put God First in Your Life, Relationships, and In All Things (Video by ApplyGodsWord.com/Mark Ballenger)

content_summary:
"Putting God first" is a phrase that is easy to use incorrectly. While God wants to be first, he does not want to be in a box, even if this is your most important box. Putting God first is about seeking to please God in every area of life.
